parsed.internal_thinking: I have analyzed the board for the best remaining settlement location. My first settlement at Node 20 provides Wood (11), Brick (6), and Sheep (8). To balance my economy, I need Wheat and Ore. Node 44 is an excellent choice, providing access to two Wheat hexes (9 and 6) and one Ore hex (2), totaling 10 pips. While the Ore is low-frequency, the high Wheat production will allow for early development card purchases or city upgrades. Node 43 and 41 are blocked by AI_2's placements at 42 and 31. Other options like Node 35 or 33 offer slightly fewer pips or less resource diversity. By placing at 44, I secure all five resources. I plan to build my road towards Node 52, positioning myself to eventually reach Node 51, which offers a 3:1 port and a stronger Ore source (O5). [Response was too brief]
parsed.note_to_self: Secured all five resources with Node 20 (W, B, S) and Node 44 (Wh, O). Focus on upgrading to a city on Node 44 or Node 20 early. Road path is set towards the 3:1 port at Node 51. Watch AI_2's expansion in the south as they are close to my new settlement.
parsed.say_outloud: I've decided to set up my second settlement at node 44. It gives me a good mix of wheat and ore to complement my early wood and brick production. Good luck to everyone as we head into the first round!
